definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: The shortest Confidence interval of unimodal distribution is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了單峯分佈的最短置信區間的問題。

sentences.english: To construct confidence interval, the limiting distribution of change-point estimator is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 爲構造變點的置信區間給出了變點的極限分佈。

sentences.english: Confidence intervals and P-values were adjusted for the cluster design.
sentences.chinese: 置信區間和P值針對羣集設計進行調整。

sentences.english: It is the best general technique for producing confidence intervals.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種用來產生置信區間的通用技術。
